result.execSummary:
Shane Dale Nichols was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Shane Dale Nichols was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shane Dale Nichols

records.addlTxt: 9:05 AM Prosecuting attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane Dale Nichols not in court.  Attorney Walter H Isaacson in court for Shane Dale Nichols. Defendant extradited. Matter dismissed on motion of the State.
Review hearing on August 18, 2022 at 08:45 am.

8:37 AM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane Dale Nichols in court, in custody.  Attorney Walter H Isaacson in court for Shane Dale Nichols. Defendant waives extradition freely and voluntarily; signs waiver in open court. Bond revoked.
Review hearing scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Review hearing on August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Activity: Extradition hearing 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

08:34 AM Defendant Shane Dale Nichols in court by video in custody with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant demands Governor's Warrant.  Review hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Extradition hearing on May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

09:09 AM Defendant Shane Dale Nichols in court, in person in custody at the Rock County Jail with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video. Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Matter to be set to follow 22CF466.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Activity: initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

03:38 PM Defendant Shane Dale Nichols in court in custody appearing by video with attorney Walter H Isaacson also appearing by video.  David Zarwell   and intern Margaret Ginocchio appeared by video  for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Cash bond set of $50,000.00   with conditions.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
